data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Nord to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nord, Burkina Faso
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 125,133 believers in Nord that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Nord.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Nord do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Nord, Burkina Faso to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 932,398 who are far from you in Nord, Burkina Faso from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nord, Burkina Faso has a population of 1,182,800.

We estimate Nord has 125,133 people who might know Jesus, 125,269 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 932,398 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 125,133 believers living in the state of Nord. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.
